title: Find Maximum
prompt: Given an unsorted array of numbers, find a maximum

title: Sum Pair
prompt: Given an array of integers and a target value, find two integers in the array that sum up to the target value. For example, if the given array is [1, 5, 2, 9, 19, 36, 3] and the target is 10, your function should return [1, 9]. There may be 0 or more pairs in the array. If no pairs are found, return -1.

title: Calculate Sum
prompt: Return the sum of all numbers in an array. Not all entries in an array will be a number. For example, this is a valid input: ['1', 2, 3.5, [3]]. In this case, the sum should be 5.5 (2 + 3.5).

title: Find Difference
prompt: Find the difference between two arrays.

title: Unique Union
prompt: Join two arrays without including duplicate elements
